recipe_name: Olive and lemon tapenade on bruschetta
author: Lesley Waters
method: For the tapenade, place all of the tapenade ingredients into a small food processor and process until smooth and combined. For the bruschetta, heat a griddle pan until hot. Drizzle the slices of bread with the oil and chargrill until golden-brown on both sides. Serve the tapenade spread over the bruschetta and scatter over the olives and lemon wedges.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz black olives, pits removed,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  ½ lemon, juice and zest,  3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  3 slices ciabatta bread,  3 tbsp olive oil,  8 whole black olives, pits removed ,  lemon wedges
